title: Unprovoked firing by Afghan Taliban, Khwarij: Pak Army gives befitting response
content:
PESHWAR, Oct 14 (APP): Pakistan Army gave a prompt and befitting response to unprovoked firing by Afghan Taliban and Khwarij terrorists in Kurram district near the Pak-Afghan border.
Video Playerhttps://www.app.com.pk/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/WhatsApp-Video-2025-10-14-at-11.02.59-PM.mp400:0000:0000:00Use Up/Down Arrow keys to increase or decrease volume.
According to security sources, Taliban posts suffered heavy losses due to the retaliatory fire by the Pakistan Army. Fires also broke out at several Taliban posts, they added.
A Taliban tank was also destroyed, and the militants abandoned their positions and fled, the security sources further said.
